name: Managing Anxiety Support Group
description: Managing Anxiety is a supportive weekly gathering for peers to exchange personal experiences with anxiety, utilizing coping tools to empower and uplift one another. This meeting is on Tuesday's from 2:30 PM - 4:00 PM.
fullDescription: Managing Anxiety is a supportive weekly gathering for peers to exchange personal experiences with anxiety, utilizing coping tools to empower and uplift one another. This meeting is on Tuesday's from 2:30 PM - 4:00 PM.
whatTheyOffer: Managing Anxiety is a supportive weekly gathering for peers to exchange personal experiences with anxiety, utilizing coping tools to empower and uplift one another. This meeting is on Tuesday's from 2:30 PM - 4:00 PM.
howToGetIt: Send email to peersupportservices@mentalhealthsf.org. Complete the Participant Information Form: https://mentalhealthsf.formstack.com/forms/participant_information_form and review the Client Rights and Requirement document: https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Client-Rights-Requirements.pdf
address: 870 Market Street, Suite 658, San Francisco, CA, 94102
agency: Mental Health Association of San Francisco (MHASF)
